K10Dx_H0349:483b-9: dpag bsam shing las rab tu 'byung //

K10Dx_H0349:483b-16: bsod nams las las rab grub pa'i //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-17: dpag bsam shing las rab tu 'byung //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-18: gzhan yang sna tshogs du ma yi //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-19: rgyan mang legs po thams cad ni //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-20: bsod nams las las rab grub pa'i //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-21: dpag bsam shing las rab tu 'byung //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-22: bsod nams las can sems can la //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-23: ma grugs skog med dri med dkar //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-25: ma rmos ma btab rang byung la //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-26: ma g-yos ma bskol 'bras kyi zas /
K10Dx_H0349:483b-27: mi rnams thams cad legs par za //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-28: der ni rtsa ba gcig las kyang //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-30: sdong bu kun la myu gu rnams //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-31: thams cad re res kun nas bskor //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-32: 'bras rnams so ma re re la //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-33: de tshe bre ni re re 'byung //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-34: dus kun dri zhim ldan pa'i 'bras //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-35: mi kun la ni 'byung ba yin //
K10Dx_H0349:483b-36: 'khor lo gnyis pa'i shing rta ni //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-0: @484a *// nyis stong dang ni nyis brgya dang //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-1: shing rta bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K10Dx_H0349:484a-2: khal ni bcu drug de bzhin du //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-3: ku ba gnyis dang bcas pa'i 'bras //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-4: sems can bsod nams ldan pas na; ;sa bon gcig las de snyed 'byung //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-5: rgyal po dung gi grong khyer ni //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-6: rgyal mtshan blo gros der gnas mi //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-7: thams cad ma lus de kun kyang //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-8: yon tan kun ldan rgyan rnams 'dzin; ;yid la gang bsam bde bar 'byor //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-9: gzugs bzang me tog rgyan la sogs //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-10: ha ri tsandan na lus la byugs //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-11: ka shi ka yi gos mchog gyon //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-12: mnyen gshin nor mang dbang phyug ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-13: pi wang ting ting shags kyis rtse //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-14: lus dang de bzhin yid rnams kyang //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-15: nyin mtshan med par shin tu skyid //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-17: dpag tshad stong phrag bcu yin te; ;tsher ma can dang mtha' 'khob med /
K10Dx_H0349:484a-18: khang mnyam ljang khu'i rtsva gsar ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-20: nad gsum tsam ni de tshe yod //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-21: bu mo lnga brgya'i lo lon tshe //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-22: khyim thab la ni 'gro bar byed //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-23: kun tu sems mthun bde dang ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-24: 'thab dang rtsod pa med par gnas //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-25: me tog 'bras bu mang po dang //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-26: 'khri shing shing thog yod pa'i tshal //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-27: sor bzhi'i dbang tsam rtsva rnams rigs //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-28: shing bal lta bur reg bya 'jam //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-29: bsil drod shin tu snyoms pa ste //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-30: char dang rlung yang shin tu snyoms //
K10Dx_H0349:484a-31: de tshe dbyar dgun ston yang snyoms //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-0: mtsho dang 'bab @484b chu rlabs med cing //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-1: sa kun de dang de ru ni //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-2: gseg ma bye ma dkar po yang //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-3: sran ma dang ni sran dkar tsam //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-4: mu tig lta bu mang pos mdzes //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-5: legs par brgyan pa'i tshal bzhin du //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-6: kun nas bzang po 'byung ba yin //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-8: de der nye zhing shin tu nye //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-9: smyug ma'i tshal dang 'od ma'i tshal //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-10: kun tu khyim bya mang po rgyu //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-11: nor mang phyug cing 'jigs pa med //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-12: kun tu khrims bzang gnod med ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-13: nyin mtshan 'dod yon lnga yis rtse //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-14: gcig tu bde bar gnas pa yin //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-16: yid rab dang zhing bde dags gnas //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-17: bza' dang btung ba bzang zhing mang //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-18: sha dang chang sogs mang bar ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-19: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-20: lha yi grong khyer lcang lo can //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-21: yangs pa can gyi grong khyer bzhin //
K10Dx_H0349:484b-22: 'dzam gling kun nas bzang por 'gyur; ;de'i dus na
K10Dx_H0349:484b-23: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di grangs med pa'i
K10Dx_H0349:484b-24: bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig dang bcu drug tu sbyin
K10Dx_H0349:484b-25: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa pha
K10Dx_H0349:484b-26: rol tu phyin par thams cad rdzogs nas thams cad
K10Dx_H0349:484b-27: sgrol ba'i tshul gyis tha ma nyid du sbyin pa
K10Dx_H0349:484b-28: chen po ste / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs
K10Dx_H0349:484b-29: thams cad mthar phyin cing 'di nas dga' ldan du
K10Dx_H0349:484b-30: mngon par skyes te; de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi
K10Dx_H0349:484b-31: khams stong phrag bcu'i lha thams cad 'ongs te sangs
K10Dx_H0349:485a-0: zhes sgra dbyangs snyan pa chen po 'byin cing mngon par @485a *//
K10Dx_H0349:485a-1: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gsol zhes skul bar byed de //
K10Dx_H0349:485a-2: de nas gzigs pa rnam pa lnga la mngon par
K10Dx_H0349:485a-3: gzigs te dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'khor nas 'ongs te
K10Dx_H0349:485a-4: rgyal po dung gi grong khyer rgyal mtshan blo gros
K10Dx_H0349:485a-5: su bram ze mdun na 'don tshangs rab ces bya
K10Dx_H0349:485a-6: ba'i btsun mo tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba'i lhums
K10Dx_H0349:485a-7: su 'jug ste / 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu 'dar zhing g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K10Dx_H0349:485a-8: der zla ba bcu song nas drang song lhung ba'i
K10Dx_H0349:485a-9: ri dvags rgyu ba'i gnas su yum las 'khrungs te
K10Dx_H0349:485a-10: / rim gyis nar son nas rang gi bsod nams
K10Dx_H0349:485a-11: kyi mthu las sa 'og nas nor bu rin po
K10Dx_H0349:485a-12: che bdun las grub ba'i khang bzang bzhi byung ba'i
K10Dx_H0349:485a-13: nang du rang nyid lha bzhin du lha mo zla
K10Dx_H0349:485a-15: gzhan yang lha mo lta bu'i bud med mang po
K10Dx_H0349:485a-16: dang lhan cig tu lo stong phrag gcig tu lha'i
K10Dx_H0349:485a-17: longs spyod lta bu la bde bar spyod de /
K10Dx_H0349:485a-18: de nas tha ma'i zhag la btsun pa'i gzugs shig
K10Dx_H0349:485a-19: mthong nas gser gyi khang bur sengge'i rgyal po mi
K10Dx_H0349:485a-20: dga' ba bzhin du rin po che'i khang bzang dpal
K10Dx_H0349:485a-21: mang po yod pa la mi dga' zhing nges par
K10Dx_H0349:485a-22: 'byung ba chen po'i sems byung ste 'jig rten 'khor
K10Dx_H0349:485a-23: lo stong phrag bcu thams cad kyi lha rnams lha'i
K10Dx_H0349:485a-24: me tog lag tu khyer nas 'jig rten gyi 'khor
K10Dx_H0349:485a-26: rgyal po dung dang bcas pa'i mi mang po yang
K10Dx_H0349:485b-0: me tog dang dri dang spos @485b phyir te khang
K10Dx_H0349:485b-1: bzang la bskor nas 'khod par byed do //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-2: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyang lha'i me tog lag tu khyer nas legs so legs so //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-3: zhes 'og min gyi bar du sgra cher sgrog cing
K10Dx_H0349:485b-4: 'khod par byed do; ;de nas rin po che'i khang
K10Dx_H0349:485b-5: bzang rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor zhing
K10Dx_H0349:485b-6: nam mkha' la song nas bco lnga'i zla ba skar
K10Dx_H0349:485b-7: ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du byang
K10Dx_H0349:485b-9: zla ba'i gdong can ma dang /
K10Dx_H0349:485b-10: gzhan btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed de /
K10Dx_H0349:485b-11: sems dpa' chen po de dang thabs cig tu 'gro
K10Dx_H0349:485b-12: ba'i sems yin pa thams cad kyang nam mkha' la
K10Dx_H0349:485b-14: de nas tshangs pa chen pos ni /
K10Dx_H0349:485b-15: dpag tshad gsum tsam yod pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin
K10Dx_H0349:485b-16: cing lha'i dbang pos dung 'phud par byed do; ;'di
K10Dx_H0349:485b-17: ltar bsod nams kyi dpal chen pos lha dang mis
K10Dx_H0349:485b-18: bskor ba'i khang bzang dang bcas pas byang chub gyi
K10Dx_H0349:485b-19: shing gi drung du nye bar 'ongs te /
K10Dx_H0349:485b-21: shing sdong khru brgya nyi shu ste //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-22: yal ga'ang khru brgya nyi shu'i srid //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-23: rlung gis dal bur bskyod pa na //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-24: rma bya'i gar gyi gdugs ltar snang //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-25: dus kun lha yi me tog ni //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-26: shin tu legs par rgyas pa yang //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-27: 'khor lo tsam gyi lte ba la //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-28: gser dri bzang bre gang tsam //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-29: rlung gis phyogs bcur bskyod pa na //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-30: dpag tshad bcur ni dri yis khyab //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-31: me tog sa la bab pa yang //
K10Dx_H0349:485b-32: byang chub shing drung nyid du gnas //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-0: @486a *// de'i dus su nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya'i rigs
K10Dx_H0349:486a-1: mang po skad snyan pos mchod pa byed cing 'gro
K10Dx_H0349:486a-2: bar byed do // de ltar byang chub kyi shing
K10Dx_H0349:486a-3: klu shing gi nye 'khor du 'ongs te nam mkha'
K10Dx_H0349:486a-4: las babs nas khang bzang sa'i nye 'khor yid du
K10Dx_H0349:486a-5: 'thad pa'i steng de nyid du 'khor bar byed do
K10Dx_H0349:486a-6: bar byed do // // der dpal gyi khang bzang
K10Dx_H0349:486a-7: gi nang du zhag bdun du dka' thub byed do
K10Dx_H0349:486a-8: bar byed do // // // de nas tshangs pa
K10Dx_H0349:486a-9: chen pos phul ba mkho ba'i yo byad blangs te
K10Dx_H0349:486a-10: rab tu byung bar byed do //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-11: 'khor thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-13: brgyad khri bzhi stong grangs snyed kyi //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-14: bram ze rig byed rab mkhas pa //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-15: de yi rjes su rab tu 'byung //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-17: de ltar rab tu byung nas lha mo zla ba'i
K10Dx_H0349:486a-18: gdong can mas phul ba'i 'o thug ro sna tshogs
K10Dx_H0349:486a-19: dang ldan pa gsol bar byed do //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-20: de'i dgong thun la byang chub kyi shing drung du
K10Dx_H0349:486a-21: nye bar 'ongs te rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang
K10Dx_H0349:486a-22: du khri bshams pa la shar gyi 'jig rten la
K10Dx_H0349:486a-23: mngon par gzigs te bzhugs par mdzad do //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-24: de nas rim gyis nyi ma'i skya rengs shar ba'i
K10Dx_H0349:486a-25: dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
K10Dx_H0349:486a-26: ye shes mngon du mdzad de 'di skad gsung bar
K10Dx_H0349:486a-27: 'gyur ro // 'khor ba'i skye bo mang por ni //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-28: dug med pa yi don gyi phyir //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-29: gnas bzang kun tu btsal byas kyang //
K10Dx_H0349:486a-30: yang yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal byung //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-0: da ni gnas bzang mchog thob @486b pas; ;da gzod gnas gdon mi 'gro ste //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-1: dug khyim sdug bsngal thams cad bcas //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-2: rab bcom tho bas bshig pa yin //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-3: nyon mongs dug bcas 'dod pa yi //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-4: yid ni rnam par dag par byas //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-5: 'di skad ces gsungs nas byang chub kyi shing la
K10Dx_H0349:486b-6: nye bar gnas te zhag bdun phrag bdun song ba
K10Dx_H0349:486b-7: dang / tshangs pas gsol ba 'debs pa gsan nas
K10Dx_H0349:486b-8: drang song lhung ba'i gnas su byin te chos kyi
K10Dx_H0349:486b-9: 'khor lo bskor ba la gshegs pa'i tshe //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-10: zhabs ni bskyod mi bskyod pa yang //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-11: shin tu rgyas pa'i bde steng gshegs //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-12: 'dab ma khru ni sum cur bcas //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-13: bar gyi 'dab ma nyi shu lnga //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-14: ge sar nyi shu'i khru dang ldan //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-15: ze 'bru la ni bcu drug ste //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-16: ge sar kha dog shin tu dmar //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-18: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar zhing
K10Dx_H0349:486b-19: gsal te nyi ma'i 'od mi gsal zhing nyin mtshan
K10Dx_H0349:486b-21: de'i tshe snga dro dang dgong mo bya'i sgras shes par byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:486b-22: me tog rgyas pas kyang 'jig rten pa rnams go bar byed do //
K10Dx_H0349:486b-23: gang dang gang na chos 'chad pa yod pa de
K10Dx_H0349:486b-24: dang der chos kyi sgra thams cad la rab tu
K10Dx_H0349:486b-26: de'i tshe bram ze brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K10Dx_H0349:486b-27: tshangs pa sa ya phrag bco brgyad kyis thog mar
K10Dx_H0349:486b-28: chos kyi bdud rtsi 'thungs te 'di ltar bcom ldan
K10Dx_H0349:486b-29: 'das bsod nams dang byin rlabs brgya phrag mang po
K10Dx_H0349:487a-0: dang ldan pa / 'od zer kha dog @487a *//
K10Dx_H0349:487a-1: sna tshogs pa 'gyed cing brgya phrag mang po'i mtshan
K10Dx_H0349:487a-2: can mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe
K10Dx_H0349:487a-3: byad brgyad cu mnyam par ldan zhing ngo mtshar mang
K10Dx_H0349:487a-4: po mnga' ba / brgya phrag mang po'i 'od de'i sku las 'byung ba yin //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-11: dngul gyi kha dog gsal zhing gsal ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byung ngo //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-12: sangs rgyas kyi sku de las 'od 'phro ba ta
K10Dx_H0349:487a-13: la'i shing lta bu phyogs thams cad du bskor zhing
K10Dx_H0349:487a-14: phung po so sor bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la
K10Dx_H0349:487a-15: lan gsum bskor ba byas shing yar mar 'gro bar
K10Dx_H0349:487a-16: byed do // bcom ldan 'das de'i sku khru brgyad
K10Dx_H0349:487a-17: cu rtsa brgyad kyi srid dang ldan pa yin te
K10Dx_H0349:487a-18: byed do // / zhabs kyi mthil nas pus mo'i bar la khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-19: pus mo dang lte ba'i bar la khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-20: lte ba dang mgur gyi bar la khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-21: mgur dang dbu'i bar la khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-22: dpung pa gnyis kyi bar la khru nyi shu lnga lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-23: sgrog rus re re la'ang khru lnga lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-24: snyan shal gnyis la khru bdun bdun no; ;spyan re re'i dkyus la khru lnga lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-25: smin ma gnyis la'ang khru lnga lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487a-27: shengs kyi dkyus la khru bdun no //
K10Dx_H0349:487b-0: mchu gnyis la khru @487b bcu'o; ;ljags kyi bskor la khru lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487b-2: zhal gyi bskor gser gyi me long lta bu la khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
K10Dx_H0349:487b-4: phyag gnyis kyi dkyus la khru bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung ba yin no //
K10Dx_H0349:487b-5: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas de ni /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-7: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' med pa dang ldan
K10Dx_H0349:487b-8: zhing 'jig rten 'khor lo stong phrag bcu po thams
K10Dx_H0349:487b-9: cad kyi lha dang mi'i dbus su bzhugs nas chos
K10Dx_H0349:487b-10: kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing ston par mdzad pa yin
K10Dx_H0349:487b-11: no // de'i rjes su sa ya 'bum phrag gcig
K10Dx_H0349:487b-12: gi lha dang mi rnams 'dzin pa med par dang
K10Dx_H0349:487b-13: po nyid du chos kyi mchog gis rnam par grol
K10Dx_H0349:487b-15: rnam par grol ba ma thob pa rnams lha'i yul du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10Dx_H0349:487b-16: 'di ltar byams pa legs pa'i mchog chen po de gang gis mi mthong zhe na /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-19: dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-20: dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-21: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa ste /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-22: sdig pa'i las lnga byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-24: byang chub kyi shing bcad pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-25: byang chub sems dpa' gsod pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:487b-26: dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba nyams par byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-1: par lta ba'i mu stegs dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-2: 'phags pa rnams la smod pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-3: gcer bu pa'i rigs can rnams kyis mi mthong ba yin no //
K10Dx_H0349:488a-4: tshigs bcad stong phrag gcig gi rgyan yod pa'i thams
K10Dx_H0349:488a-5: cad sgrol ba'i skyes rabs chen po stong phrag gsum
K10Dx_H0349:488a-6: pa zhag gcig la 'chad cing nyan par byed pa'i
K10Dx_H0349:488a-7: mi dang / mar me stong phrag gcig 'bul ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-8: dri bzang po med na yang me tog stong phrag gcig tsam 'bul ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-9: autpa la sngon po stong phrag gcig tsam 'bul ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-10: sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel yod pa'i mchod rten dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-11: sangs rgyas kyi sku la mchod pa byed pa thams cad ni /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-12: sangs rgyas byams pa de chos 'chad pa'i dus su
K10Dx_H0349:488a-13: de'i drung du chos kyi mchog gis rnam par grol
K10Dx_H0349:488a-16: de ma yin pa sems can sbyin pa gtong ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-19: byang chub kyi shing gi sa bon skyed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-20: ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-21: byang chub kyi shing dang mchod rten la zhabs tog byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-22: sems can la phan pa'i tshal byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-25: mgron po'i gnas khang byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-27: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad par byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488a-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag 'chad pa la dri
K10Dx_H0349:488b-0: @488b dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed
K10Dx_H0349:488b-1: pa dang / khri la byi dor byed cing legs par chos nyan pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-2: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur dam pa byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-3: ma dang pha'i zhabs tog byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-4: rigs kyis che ba la gus par byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-5: sdom pa srung ba'i dus su dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-6: tshes bco lnga la dus ston byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-8: stan ster bar byed pa thams cad kyis yang dag
K10Dx_H0349:488b-9: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong zhing mjal
K10Dx_H0349:488b-10: ba yin no // de lta bu'i bsod nams mang
K10Dx_H0349:488b-11: po mi nus na yang me tog sbar mo re
K10Dx_H0349:488b-12: ba yin no // tsam dang / mar me gcig tsam 'bul bar byed pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-13: gzhan gyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'i
K10Dx_H0349:488b-14: dge ba byed pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis de'i
K10Dx_H0349:488b-15: dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams
K10Dx_H0349:488b-17: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa de
K10Dx_H0349:488b-18: mthong bar 'dod pa'i dad pa yod cing sbyin pa
K10Dx_H0349:488b-19: gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-21: don yang dag par sgom pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:488b-22: dge ba'i las shin tu legs par byed pa rnams kyis shin tu legs par mthong ba yin no //
K10Dx_H0349:488b-23: thub pa'i gsung rab thos gyur nas //
K10Dx_H0349:488b-24: tshangs par spyod pa sgrub byed pa //
K10Dx_H0349:488b-25: de rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol phyin //
K10Dx_H0349:488b-27: tshangs spyod yang dag sgrub byed cing //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-0: @489a *// sbyin gnas mchog la sbyin byed dang //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-1: bsnyen gnas bslab pa sogs srung dang //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-2: byams pa'i sgom la legs gnas pa //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-3: rtse gcig pa yis sgrub par gyis //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-4: nyin mtshan bsod nams rab sgrub gyis //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-5: 'di ru de dag sgrub byed na //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-6: sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10Dx_H0349:489a-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang bcas pa'i
K10Dx_H0349:489a-9: 'khor de dag thams cad yi rang ste bcom ldan
K10Dx_H0349:489a-10: 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-11: 'phags pa byams pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10Dx_H0349:489a-12: thub dbang mchog dang rgyal pa byams pa yi //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-13: bstan pa gsal byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-14: yon tan dang ldan singge gling yul gyi //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-15: stong phrag mang po'i dge 'dun kun gyi gtso //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-16: mar me mdzad slob rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-17: pan chen a'a nanda shr'i yon tan can //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-18: dge slong chos kyi spyan can mkhas gnyis mkhas //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-19: bstan la phan 'dod bzang po de nyid dang //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-20: de la legs gtugs dge slong lung rigs 'dzin //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-21: skad gnyis smra ba mchog gi rjes 'jug pa //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-22: kun dga' rgyal mtshan thub bstan dpal bzang pos //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-23: ston pa 'das nas lo stong brgyad brgya dang //
K10Dx_H0349:489a-24: lnga bcu lhag pa'i zla ba bcu 'das dus //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-0: chos kyi rgyal po ha shang mnga' @489b gsol tshe //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-1: me lug dgun zla ra ba'i yar ngo la //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-2: dpal ldan bla ma kun dga' sengge yi //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-3: sku drin la brten dpal ldan sa skyar ni //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-4: sgra don ji bzhin legs par bsgyur ba min //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-5: 'phags nor rgyan ldan skyes bu dam pa rnams //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-6: dam chos rin chen 'di la gtsug rgyan mdzod //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-7: nyon mongs nad can phrag dog rab rib can //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-8: chos sman 'di bsten nad med mig gsal 'gyur //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-9: dge ba 'di gzhan ma lus legs bsdoms te //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-10: bla ma thub dbang byams pa mgon la sogs //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-11: sangs rgyas kun mnyes rnam dag rgya chen zhing //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-12: rnam dag rab bsgrubs bstan pa mchog bsgrubs nas //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-13: phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed kyi sprul pa yis //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-14: sems can thams cad bstan la dang byas shing //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-15: sangs rgyas bstan pa rab tu rgyas byas ta //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-16: sangs rgyas sku gsum ye shes myur thob shog /
K10Dx_H0349:489b-17: shes bya mtha' yas rab tu zab phyir dang //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-18: shes byed ched can rab tu rtogs sla'i phyir //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-19: 'khrul par gyur na rab tu sems dge'i phyir //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-20: skye bo mkhas rnams rab tu bzod mdzad rigs //
K10Dx_H0349:489b-21: rgya dpe dang legs par gtugs so //
